page.title: 15TRANSPORT IN LLANBRYNMAIR
page.content: There is a lot of transport in Llanbrynmair.Most of the transport is cars.There is public transport here as well and that is buses.The buses travel from {Machynlleth}to{Newtown} and stopping in our village and others en route.They stop here at {7.oo am } to{Newtown,8.00 am }to Newtown, 8.15 am to {Machynlleth, 11.20 am}to { {Machynlleth ,3.00pm }to {Newtown {4.50pm}to {Machynlleth,5.45pm to {Newtown}and {6.00pm}to {Machynlleth.} Only on Tuesdays and Saturdays there are extra buses which come back at 2.20pm from {Newtown}because it is Market Day on Tuesday.The company which runs the buses is Crosville.The colour of the buses is green and they have single and double deckers.One or two people have motorbikes or mopeds for women.Men mostly use their cars if they work in factories or offices.
